hero.sub: From prototype to production in regulated environments — governance, observability, and cost under control.

demos.title: Prototype Demos
demos.sub: Watch how I turn ideas into working AI prototypes in days, not months.

services_teaser.title: How I Help
services_teaser.sub: From strategy to shipping — I help teams move fast with AI.

services.page_sub: Focused engagements designed to move fast and deliver measurable outcomes.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.best_for: Best for: strategy clarity, architecture review, build-or-buy decisions
consulting.deliverables: AI strategy assessment, architecture blueprint, vendor evaluation, risk & governance framework, executive readout.
consulting.desc: I help leadership teams cut through AI hype and make confident, informed decisions. Expect a clear roadmap, not a slide deck.

prototyping.title: Rapid Prototyping
prototyping.best_for: Best for: proving value fast, de-risking before committing headcount
prototyping.deliverables: Working prototype, evaluation suite, cost model, handoff documentation, demo recording.
prototyping.desc: I build production-grade prototypes that prove what's possible — and what isn't. Your team inherits clean code and clear documentation.

training.title: Enablement & Training
training.best_for: Best for: upskilling engineering teams, internal AI champions
training.deliverables: Custom workshop, hands-on labs, reference materials, follow-up Q&A session.
training.desc: I run intensive, hands-on workshops tailored to your team's stack and skill level. No generic content — everything is built around your real problems.

work.page_sub: Anonymized case studies from regulated enterprises and global institutions.

cases.title: Enterprise AI Platform
cases.problem: The bank needed a centralized platform for GenAI experimentation that met strict regulatory requirements.
cases.approach: Designed and built an internal AI platform with guardrails, cost tracking, and model governance baked in.
cases.outcome: Platform adopted by 12+ teams across 3 regions. Reduced time-to-deploy for AI use cases from months to days.
cases.owned: Architecture, platform engineering, stakeholder alignment, governance framework

cases.title: Agentic Document Processing
cases.problem: Manual document review was consuming thousands of analyst hours per quarter with high error rates.
cases.approach: Built a multi-agent system that extracts, validates, and routes document data with human-in-the-loop oversight.
cases.outcome: 80% reduction in processing time. Error rate dropped below 2%. System handles 50K+ documents/month.
cases.owned: Agent architecture, evaluation pipeline, production deployment, monitoring

cases.title: AI-Powered Research Assistant
cases.problem: Consultants spent hours searching across fragmented knowledge bases for relevant case studies and frameworks.
cases.approach: Prototyped a RAG-based research assistant with semantic search, citation tracking, and quality evaluation.
cases.outcome: Prototype validated in 3 weeks. Secured executive buy-in and a dedicated engineering team for production build.
cases.owned: End-to-end prototype, evaluation framework, stakeholder demos, handoff

cases.title: Cost Optimization Engine
cases.problem: GenAI costs were growing 40% month-over-month with no visibility into usage patterns or ROI.
cases.approach: Built an observability layer with per-team cost attribution, usage analytics, and automated budget alerts.
cases.outcome: 30% cost reduction in first quarter. Full visibility for finance and engineering leadership.
cases.owned: Observability architecture, dashboard design, cost modeling, rollout

about.bio: I'm Nils — an AI architect and builder who helps regulated enterprises turn GenAI ambitions into production systems. I've spent years at the intersection of enterprise software and applied AI, working with banks, consultancies, and global institutions. I don't do slide decks without code. Every engagement ends with something that works.

principles.title: The Bitter Lesson
principles.desc: Scale and compute win. I build systems that leverage foundation models rather than fight them.

principles.title: Platform-First
principles.desc: One-off solutions don't survive. I design for reuse, governance, and team autonomy from day one.

principles.title: Evaluation-Driven
principles.desc: If you can't measure it, you can't ship it. Rigorous evaluation is the foundation of every project I touch.

insights.sub: I'm preparing a series of articles on building AI systems in regulated environments. Stay tuned.

contact.page_sub: Whether you need a strategy session, a prototype, or a workshop — I'd love to hear about your challenge.
